[Christina's Management Trainee Program]
At Christina's, we focus on developing our talents. Christina's team members are given the opportunities, assignments, experiences and coaching to become successful young entrepreneurs in Vietnam. We aim to develop young people who can contribute directly to make a positive impact to the hospitality & tourism industry of Vietnam and throughout the world.
During the program, you will learn the inner workings of a world class hospitality company from the ground up. Since we focus heavily on training and development, you will have the opportunity to gain a multitude of skills that will serve you for the rest of your life. 
We are looking for those who have: 
- High level of integrity 
- Strong work ethic 
- Ability to learn quickly and to work well with other team members 
- English fluency (must be able to speak, read, and write) 
- Graduate degree (or in final year of study)
What will you do: 
- Experience Christina's Host Training Program: Handling daily tasks, which include preparing guest rooms, up-keeping our common spaces, and assisting guests with ad-hoc requests; Managing and sourcing supplies and inventories; Shadowing hostâ€™s responsibilities, such as responding to guestsâ€™ messages and inquiries, scheduling cleaning, check-in, check-out, and providing recommendations and selling tour activities. 
- Rotate among different departments to gain insights of the business after the general training period (Sales & Marketing, Tech, Human Resources, Tour Operations...) 
- After the general training period, trainee will be given opportunity to dive deeply into the area that is suitable with their ability & interest and be provided initial job trainings, leadership trainings.
- At Christinaâ€™s, all member co-operate in general areas and expected to work collaboratively and participate in a wide range of tasks as requested.
What we offer: 
- A mentorship program that provides guidance and training in your young professional life
- Formal as well as on-the-job training 
- Opportunities to meet and interact with travellers from around the world 
- Diverse, inclusive & supportive working environment 
- Competitive salary 
About us: 
Team Christinaâ€™s consists of world travelers, Vietnamese returnees, and local graduates, citizens, and entrepreneurs from all different backgrounds. We believe that in order to best understand and anticipate the needs of our guests, our team needs to reflect the diversity of our guests as much as possible. 
Learn more about us at https://www.christinas.vn/ 
How to apply: 
If you think you can contribute to our social mission, please send your Resume and Cover letter in English (Maximum at 1 A4 page) via our email address talent@christinas.vn
